Articles.Content:
.

AIR RAIDER

This craft sports new product from Sector 7 Space Laboratories VTOL Dropship Division other than the Craft itself, an Air Raider Engine System S7-AR1 and an Air Raider Landing Gear S7-ARLG1.

Operations:

The craft holds a course better above 100 m/s without RCS, otherwise you will need the RCS for holding a good course. Fuel Capacity is enough to get you to the Air Base on the Island and back if you are using your fuel wisely. When approaching the a landing zone reduce speed to quarter throttle, engage lift engines and kill the rear engine, as your reducing altitude use the W & K to assist with descent speed as you land. Flight Controls listed below, for craft file click on the craft name.

FLIGHT CONTROLS

Lift Engines - 1

Rear Engines - 2

Cargo Bay Doors - 3

Ladders - 4

Docking Port Shield - 5

Headlights - 6

Landing Lights - 7

Landing Assist Thrusters - W&K
Very nicely done! I really like it's engine capabilities.

Very nicely done! I really like it's engine capabilities.

Thanks for the compliments, it means a lot coming from respected builders like you!
Love the profile! Always had a thing for anhedral (downswept) wings, for some reason. Approve!

Love the profile! Always had a thing for anhedral (downswept) wings, for some reason. Approve!

When I started running out of ideas I went to Google Images and found hundreds of really cool crafts from other Games, I don't mention them on here for the sake of Squad Rep. Thanks for the compliments!

- - - Updated - - -

Very nicely done! I really like it's engine capabilities.

Top Speeds are not too much but really not needed for a Dropship, we don't want to hurt the Cargo anyway

Carrying around cargo in style! I like it.

Thank you for the compliments these can give a person motivation to push their skills further, also I like the Battlecruiser built by UFKR nice work!
